text: Asim apane rasulam nu nisani'am de nala bheji'a ate usa nala kitaba ate takari utari tam ki lokam la'i inasafa sathapita hove. Ate asim loha utari'a jisa vica bahuta takata hai ate lokam la'i labha hai. Ate tam ki alaha samajha lave ki kauna usa di ate usa de rasulam di binham dekhe madada karada hai. Besaka alaha sakatisali ate takatavara hai
